page.title: 06SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: RETFORD SPORTS CENTRE IS A MODERN SPORTS COMPLEX LOCATED IN ORDSALL AND SERVING RETFORD AND THE SURROUNDING VILLAGES.THE CENTRE IS HOUSED IN A PURPOSE BUILT COMPLEX OPENED NINE YEARS AGO IN 1976.INSIDE THE MANAGER, MR.PAXMAN,WAS BUSY TAKING TELEPHONE CALLS AND WRITING LETTERS.HE TOLD US THAT HE HAD BEEN MANAGER OF THE CENTRE SINCE IT OPENED.ABOUT 300,000 PEOPLE USE THE CENTRE EVERY YEAR;SCHOOLS MAKE USE OF THE CENTRES FACILITIES WITH ABOUT 200,000 SCHOOL CHILDREN VISITING THE SPORTS CENTRE ANNUALLY.IT COSTS ABOUT Â£150,000 PER YEAR TO RUN THE SPORTS CENTRE AND INCOME FROM THE VARIOUS PARTS OF THE CENTRE AMOUNT TO ABOUT Â£125,000 PER ANNUM.IT IS HOPED TO EXTEND THE CENTRE IN FUTURE TO IMPROVE ITS FACILITIES.THE CENTRE EMPLOYS 6 FULL TIME STAFF AND 28 PART TIME WORKERS.
